title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From Ground to Cloud: CAE Innovates with AWS & Red Hat (HMC203)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从地面到云端：CAE 与 AWS 和 Red Hat 的创新合作 (HMC203)
abstract: CAE is leading the transformation of aviation training by embracing a hybrid cloud strategy with Red Hat technologies on AWS. As an industry leader, CAE leverages Red Hat OpenShift Service on AWS (ROSA), Ansible Automation Platform, and RHEL to right-size its infrastructure, optimize costs, and accelerate innovation — all while meeting strict regulatory standards. This session showcases how CAE maintains its leadership by delivering new services faster, automating global operations, and enabling business growth with agility and resilience. Learn how CAE, AWS, and Red Hat drive sustained competitive advantage in a complex, global industry. This presentation is brought to you by Red Hat, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: CAE通过在AWS上采用Red Hat技术的混合云策略，正在引领航空培训的变革。作为行业领导者，CAE利用Red Hat OpenShift Service on AWS (ROSA)、Ansible自动化平台和RHEL来合理配置基础设施、优化成本并加速创新——同时满足严格的监管标准。本次会议展示了CAE如何通过更快地交付新服务、自动化全球运营以及以敏捷性和弹性实现业务增长来保持其领导地位。了解CAE、AWS和Red Hat如何在复杂的全球行业中推动持续的竞争优势。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Red Hat为您呈现。
